title: T206 Newspaper Ads for sale - Old Mill and Hindu
author: Colorado723

posts.post_title: T206 Newspaper Ads for sale - Old Mill and Hindu
posts.post_content:
How many of you have seen Old Mill and Hindu newspaper ads depicting the sale of tobacco with baseball cards...I'm sure quite a few. Now how many of you own the actual ads? Well I am looking to sell them. I have quite a few so if you are seriously interested in purchasing one or all of them then send me an email to [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url] and I will send you the images.

T206Museum.com has a few of these ads for sale online for between $180-$220 but they are cut out ads. I have full newspaper sheets for sale which would look great hanging up in your man cave or home. Hindu ads are larger then the Old Mill ads.

Thanks,

Doug

Hey everyone,

I changed my member name from Colorado723 back to Brass23, my original member name. I wasn't able to get onto my old name so I had created a new one but after speaking with Leon, we figured out the glitch and I'm back as Brass23. 

So as I said before if you are actually interested in the newspaper ads please email me at [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]. Thanks

Doug
